message.description: The message to be sent, or another message object to resend.The maximum length for a message is 35,000 bytes or 4,096 characters. Longer messages will not be sliced automatically, and you should slice them manually if the text to send is longer than said length.

reply_to.description: 消息ID，可从Telegram消息链接获取, 例如：https://t.me/{chat_id}/{message_id}
